name: Set
semantic_context: Sets values on items and optionally remove other values
natural_language_description: 这是 Set 节点。主要用于: Sets values on items and optionally remove other values

keepOnlySet.name: keepOnlySet
keepOnlySet.description: Whether only the values set on this node should be kept and all others removed
keepOnlySet.natural_language_description: 参数名: Keep Only Set | 作用: Whether only the values set on this node should be kept and all others removed | 默认值: False

values.name: values
values.natural_language_description: 参数名: Values to Set | 作用: The value to set | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: dotNotation (值: None) - By default, dot-notation is used in property names. This means that "a.b" will set the property "b" underneath "a" so { "a": { "b": value} }.If that is not intended this can be deactivated, it will then set { "a.b": value } instead..
